column6:
*rain
value:0
max:[>duration]
description:(on change)
falling / still falling / pouring down / getting lighter / about to stop

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnRain)

OnValue:ABOVE [>duration]
set(>rain, 0)
disable(>rain)
enable(! sky >sky)
set(!sky>hours to rain, 20?50)

sky
value:0
max:[>hours to rain]
description:(75%)
clear / clear / cloudy / getting cloudier / gray and humid, it's gonna rain

OnValue:ABOVE [>hours to rain]
enable(!rain>rain)
set(! rain>rain, 0)
set(! rain >duration, 10?40)
disable(>sky)

seconds
value:0

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnSeconds)

OnValue:ABOVE 60
sub(>seconds, 60)
add(! minutes>minutes, 1)
column7:
seconds passed
value:0

OnValue:ABOVE 0
add(>seconds, 1)
sub(>seconds passed, 1)
column8:
$ wait
add(>seconds passed, INPUT NUM)
write ( some time passes by )

column6:
minutes
value:0
OnValue:ABOVE 60
sub(>minutes, 60)
add(! hours>hours, 1)
column7:
$ wait
add(>minutes, INPUT NUM)
write ( some time passes by )

column6:
hours
value:6
max:24
description:(never) is {value} o'clock

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnHours)

OnValue:24
set(>hours, 0)
add(>days, 1)
set(>part of day, 0)
column7:
$ wait
add(>hours passed, INPUT NUM)
write ( hours pass by )
column8:
hours passed
value:0
OnValue:ABOVE 0
add(>hours, 1)
sub(>hours passed, 1)

column6:
part of day
value:6
max:24
description:(on change)
it's still dark around / the sun is slowly starting to rise / the sun is risen, it's morning time / the sun is in the middle of the sky, it's noon / the sun is still here / light is slowly desappearing into the distance / the night is setting, as things go darker around you / the night is here, it's dark around

days
value:0?30
max:30
description:
it's the {value} of [mounth>mounths]

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnDays)

OnValue:30
add(>mounths, 1)
set(>days, 0)
column7:
$ wait
add(>day, INPUT NUM)
write ( some days by )

column6:
mounths
value:0?12
max:12
description:
january / february / march / april / may / june / july / august / september / october / november / december

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnMounths)

OnValue:12
set(>mounths, 0)
add(>years, 1)
column7:
$ wait
add(>mounth, INPUT NUM)
write ( mounths pass by )

column6:
years
value:2000
description:
it's {value}

OnValue:ABOVE 0
triggerEvent(OnYears)
column7:
$ wait
add(>year, INPUT NUM)
write ( years pass by )
